question: Who presents The National Handicraft award ?
explanation: National Handicrafts Award is an Indian Government award conferred to outstanding master crafts persons in recognition of their outstanding contribution towards development of crafts. The main objective of this award is to give recognition to the outstanding crafts persons in the Handicraft sector. This award is amongst the highest award for the handicrafts artisans of the India. It was introduced in 1965 and presented by the president of India.
